Title: 2 States
Writer: Chetan Bhagat (story), Abhishek Varman (screenplay), Hussain Dalal (dialogue)
Actors: Arjun Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Amrita Singh, Revathy
Plot: A story about a romantic journey of a culturally opposite couple - Krish Malhotra and Ananya Swaminathan. They meet at the IIM-Ahmedabad College and during the program they fall in love. ...
